events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience and skills presented.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned and will be reaching out to you soon to discuss next steps.
We completed your initial screening and are impressed by your background; we would like to schedule a technical interview.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 2 PM. Please prepare accordingly for the coding exercises.
You successfully completed the technical interview. We will review your performance and get back to you soon.
Based on your technical interview, we've scheduled an HR interview on May 15th at 11 AM to discuss company culture and benefits.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and they were very positive about your fit within the team and company values.
We are excited to extend you a formal job offer for the Software Engineer position with competitive compensation and benefits.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and requested some details about the onboarding process, which we clarified promptly.
We received your signed acceptance of the offer. Welcome aboard! We look forward to your contributions to the engineering team.
Your onboarding has officially started with an orientation scheduled and access to all necessary systems and resources.
The hiring process is now complete. Weâ€™re excited to have you join us and wish you a successful start with the company.
